title: University branding
content:
Hi,

I need suggestions for a logo font for a university. Something modern, sans serif. Maybe a condensed display or a geometric rounded swiss kind of font.

Need some inspiration please,

thank you!
author: Ju22

comments.content: What kind of university is it? What distinguishes it from other universities? Why are you searching for something modern and sans serif?
My university uses Akkurat for most of their branding and I think it looks nice. It's modern and has a 'cool but not too cool' feel.

Without questioning why it has to be modern and sans, I like this custom font by Bruce Mau: [http://www.rotman.utoronto.ca/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417171505/http:/www.rotman.utoronto.ca/). Also, Galaxie Polaris works quite well for Columbia Business School.
